name: We Build Black
description: We Build Black is a non-profit organization dedicated to increasing Black representation in tech through networking, skill-sharing, and mentorship. They offer various developmental programs and have organized events like the Mavens I/O: Black Women in Tech Conference
services: Black-owned Technical training in New-York consultation

name: All Star Code
address: While they have a New York presence, a specific physical address for training is not consistently listed. Their main office is in New York
description: All Star Code teaches computer science skills to young Black men, aiming to foster an entrepreneurial mindset and provide the tools needed to succeed in a technological world

name: Black Girls Code
address: While they have a New York presence, a specific physical address for training is not consistently listed. They operate nationally and internationally
description: Black Girls Code is a nonprofit organization dedicated to introducing young Black girls to technology and programming, aiming to increase the number of Black women in STEM fields

name: BDPA Cloud Academy
address: Operates in multiple locations, including New York. Specific training addresses may vary by cohort
description: This program empowers Black Americans with hands-on training in cloud computing technologies, aiming to diversify talent and drive innovation

name: AI 4 Black Kids
